18 static const double DEFAULT_CAR_WHEELBASE = 0.25;

20 static const std::string DEFAULT_ODOM_FRAME_ID = "odom";

30 void fetchWheelBase(ros::NodeHandle* nh, double& wheelBase)
31 {
32  if (nh->hasParam("odom_sim/wheel_base"))
33  {
34  nh->getParam("odom_sim/wheel_base", wheelBase);
35  }
36  else
37  {
38  wheelBase = DEFAULT_CAR_WHEELBASE;
39  }
40 }
41 
42 void fetchLoopRate(ros::NodeHandle* nh, double& loopRate)
43 {
44  if (nh->hasParam("odom_sim/loop_rate_control"))
45  {
46  nh->getParam("odom_sim/loop_rate_control", loopRate);
47  }
48  else
49  {
50  loopRate = DEFAULT_LOOP_RATE;
51  }
52 }

140 void motionCommand(const twist_msg::ConstPtr& cmdIn, twist_msg* cmdOut,
141  bool* isTwistCmd)
142 {
143  *cmdOut = *cmdIn;
144  *isTwistCmd = true;
145 }

147 void steeringCommand(const int16_msg::ConstPtr& cmdIn, int* cmdOut,
148  bool* isTwistCmd)
149 {
150  *cmdOut = cmdIn->data;
151  *isTwistCmd = false;
152 }

154 void motorCommand(const int16_msg::ConstPtr& cmdIn, int* cmdOut,
155  bool* isTwistCmd)
156 {
157  *cmdOut = cmdIn->data;
158  *isTwistCmd = false;
159 }

162 using namespace simulation;
163 
164 int main(int argc, char** argv)
165 {
166 
167  ros::init(argc, argv, "simulation_control");
168  ros::NodeHandle nh;
169  // create parameter variables
170  double loopRate, wheelBase;
171  std::string motionCmdTopic, steeringCmdTopic, motorCmdTopic, odomTopic,
172  odomFrameID, odomChildFrameID, imuTopic;
173  // fetch parameters from ros param server
174  fetchLoopRate(&nh, loopRate);
175  fetchWheelBase(&nh, wheelBase);
176  fetchMotionCommandTopic(&nh, motionCmdTopic);
177  fetchSteeringCommandTopic(&nh, steeringCmdTopic);
178  fetchMotorCommandTopic(&nh, motorCmdTopic);
179  fetchOdomTopic(&nh, odomTopic);
180  fetchOdomFrameID(&nh, odomFrameID);
181  fetchOdomChildFrameID(&nh, odomChildFrameID);
182  fetchImuTopic(&nh, imuTopic);
183  // get current time and configure our car model simulation
184  ros::Time currentTime = ros::Time::now();
185  CarModel car(wheelBase, currentTime);
186 
187  std::vector<double> simPose;
188  twist_msg motionCmd;
189  int steeringCmd, motorCmd;
190  bool isTwistCmd = true;
191  tf::TransformBroadcaster odom_broadcaster;
192  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped odom_trans;
193  odom_msg odom;
194  imu_msg imu;
195 
196  ros::Subscriber motionControl = nh.subscribe<twist_msg>(
197  motionCmdTopic, 10,
198  boost::bind(motionCommand, _1, &motionCmd, &isTwistCmd));
199  ros::Subscriber steeringControl = nh.subscribe<int16_msg>(
200  steeringCmdTopic, 1,
201  boost::bind(steeringCommand, _1, &steeringCmd, &isTwistCmd));
202  ros::Subscriber motorControl = nh.subscribe<int16_msg>(
203  motorCmdTopic, 1,
204  boost::bind(motorCommand, _1, &motorCmd, &isTwistCmd));
205  ros::Publisher odomPub = nh.advertise<odom_msg>(odomTopic, 10);
206  ros::Publisher imuPub = nh.advertise<imu_msg>(imuTopic, 10);
207 
208  // Loop starts here:
209  ros::Rate loop_rate(loopRate);
210  while (ros::ok())
211  {
212  currentTime = ros::Time::now();
213  if (isTwistCmd == false)
214  {
215  simPose = *car.getUpdate(-steeringCmd / 20, motorCmd / 50, currentTime);
216  }
217  else
218  {
219  simPose = *car.getUpdateTwist(motionCmd, currentTime);
220  }
221 
222  geometry_msgs::Quaternion odom_quat =
223  tf::createQuaternionMsgFromYaw(simPose[2]);
224 
225  // first, we'll publish the transform over tf
226 
227  odom_trans.header.stamp = currentTime;
228  odom_trans.header.frame_id = odomFrameID;
229  odom_trans.child_frame_id = odomChildFrameID;
230 
231  odom_trans.transform.translation.x = simPose[1];
232  odom_trans.transform.translation.y = -simPose[0];
233  odom_trans.transform.translation.z = 0.0;
234  odom_trans.transform.rotation = odom_quat;
235  // send the transform
236  odom_broadcaster.sendTransform(odom_trans);
237 
238  // next, we'll publish the odometry message over ROS
239  odom.header.stamp = currentTime;
240  odom.header.frame_id = odomFrameID;
241  // set the position
242  odom.pose.pose.position.x = simPose[1];
243  odom.pose.pose.position.y = -simPose[0];
244  odom.pose.pose.position.z = 0.0;
245  odom.pose.pose.orientation = odom_quat;
246  // set the velocity
247  odom.child_frame_id = odomChildFrameID;
248  odom.twist.twist.linear.x = car.getVx();
249  odom.twist.twist.linear.y = car.getVy();
250  odom.twist.twist.angular.z = car.getAngularVelocity();
251 
252  // create imu sensor message
253  imu.header.stamp = currentTime;
254  imu.header.frame_id = "robot_simulation";
255  imu.angular_velocity.z = car.getAngularVelocity();
256  imu.linear_acceleration.x = car.getAx();
257  imu.linear_acceleration.y = car.getAy();
258 
259  // publish the messages
260  odomPub.publish(odom);
261  imuPub.publish(imu);
262 
263  ros::spinOnce();
264  loop_rate.sleep();
265  }
266 
267  ros::spin();
268 }
